TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlPipe extends System.Object

summary.span: 允許 SQL Server 資料庫上同處理序 (In-Process) 執行的 Managed 預存程序 (Stored Procedure) 將結果傳回呼叫端。

span.span: Allows managed stored procedures running in-process on a SQL Server database to return results back to the caller.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體才可以提供給受管理的預存程序，透過屬性類別。An instance of this class is made available to managed stored procedures through the property of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會使用和從預存程序中的資料來源選取資料列。The following example uses and to select rows from a data source in a stored procedure. 然後此範例使用執行命令，並將結果傳送回用戶端。The example then uses a to execute the command and send the results back to the client. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExecuteAndSend(class System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand command) cil managed

span.span: The object to be executed.

summary.span: 執行做為參數傳遞的命令，並將結果傳送至用戶端。

span.span: Executes the command passed as a parameter and sends the results to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了任何實際的結果，其他訊息和錯誤也會傳送至用戶端直接。In addition to any actual results, other messages and errors are also sent directly to the client. 輸出參數和傳回值不會傳送至用戶端。這些是提供給呼叫者的命令物件的參數集合。Output parameters and return values are not sent to the client; these are available to the caller, through the parameters collection of the command object. 如果命令未繫結到同處理序，就會擲回。If the command is not bound to an in-process connection, an is thrown. 繫結至跨處理序 (Out-Of-Process) 連接的命令不支援這個方法。This method is not supported on commands bound to out-of-process connections. 如果錯誤提交，例外狀況會傳送至管道，但也會傳送複本給呼叫的 managed 程式碼的物件。If there are errors in the object that was submitted, exceptions are sent to the pipe, but a copy is also sent to calling managed code. 如果呼叫程式碼不會攔截例外狀況，它會散佈到堆疊的 TRANSACT-SQL 程式碼，並在輸出中出現兩次。If the calling code doesn't catch the exception, it will propagate up the stack to the Transact-SQL code and appear in the output twice. 如果呼叫的程式碼攔截例外狀況，管道取用者還是會看到錯誤，但不是會有重複的錯誤。If the calling code does catch the exception, the pipe consumer will still see the error, but there will not be a duplicate error. ## Examples 下列範例會使用和從預存程序中的資料來源選取資料列。The following example uses and to select rows from a data source in a stored procedure. 然後此範例使用執行命令，並將結果傳送回用戶端。The example then uses a to execute the command and send the results back to the client. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.ExecuteAndSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.ExecuteAndSend/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.ExecuteAndSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.ExecuteAndSend/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The is .

exception.span: 繫結至跨處理序 (Out-Of-Process) 連接的命令不支援這個方法。

span.span: This method is not supported on commands bound to out-of-process connections.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSendingResults As Boolean
public: property bool IsSendingResults { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否處於將單一結果集 (Result Set) 傳送回用戶端的模式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the is in the mode of sending single result sets back to the client.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 如果已呼叫 方法，且 處於將單一結果集傳送回用戶端的模式，則為 ，否則為

span.span: if the method has been called and the is in the mode of sending single result sets back to the client; otherwise .

summary.span: 將結果直接傳送至用戶端或目前的輸出消費者。

span.span: Sends results directly to the client or current output consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **傳送**方法直接到用戶端或呼叫端會傳送資料。The **Send** method sends data straight to the client or caller. 它通常是用戶端取用的輸出**管道**方法，但在巢狀 CLR 的情況下預存程序輸出取用者也可以是預存程序。It is usually the client that consumes the output from the **Pipe** method, but in the case of nested CLR stored procedures the output consumer can also be a stored procedure. 例如，Procedure1 呼叫與命令文字"EXEC Procedure2"。For example, Procedure1 calls with the command text "EXEC Procedure2". Procedure2 也是 managed 預存程序。Procedure2 is also a managed stored procedure. 如果 Procedure2 此時呼叫，資料列會傳送至 Procedure1 的讀取器不到用戶端。If Procedure2 now calls , the row is sent to Procedure1's reader, not to the client.

summary.span: 將多資料列結果集直接傳送至用戶端或目前的輸出消費者。

span.span: Sends a multirow result set directly to the client or current output consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果物件傳入參數具有隱藏資料行，這些資料行不會傳播至結果集傳送至用戶端。If the object passed in as a parameter has hidden columns, those columns are not propagated to the result set sent to the client.

span.span: The is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Send(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 要傳送至用戶端的訊息字串。

span.span: The message string to be sent to the client.

summary.span: 將字串訊息直接傳送至用戶端或目前的輸出消費者。

span.span: Sends a string message directly to the client or current output consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息字串做為參考用訊息傳送至用戶端。The message string is sent as an informational message to the client. 用戶端應用程式可以接聽訊息，透過不同的機制，根據資料存取應用程式發展介面 (API) 所使用。Client applications can listen to messages through different mechanisms, depending on the data access application programming interface (API) that they use. 例如，如果用戶端使用 ADO.NET，訊息傳輸到事件。For example, if the client is using ADO.NET, the messages transmit through the event. ## Examples 下列範例會使用將訊息字串直接傳送給用戶端的方法。The following example uses the method to send a message string directly to the client. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.Send#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.Send/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.Send#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.Send/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The is greater than 4,000 characters.
The is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SendResultsEnd() cil managed

summary.span: 標記結果集的結尾，並將 執行個體返回初始狀態。

span.span: Marks the end of a result set, and returns the instance back to the initial state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Managed 預存程序可以將結果集傳送給未實作的用戶端。Managed stored procedures can send result sets to clients that are not implementing a . 這個方法中，連同和，允許將自訂結果集給用戶端傳送的預存程序。This method, along with and , allow stored procedures to send custom result sets to the client. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新及其。The following example creates a new and its . 範例接著標示結果集使用的開頭方法，會將範例資料與記錄傳送回用戶端會使用方法，並以設定結果的結尾標記方法。The example then marks the beginning of a result set using the method, sends records with example data back to the client using the method, and marks the end of the result set with the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsEnd/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The method was not previously called.

span.span: A object with the column values for the row to be sent to the client.

param.span: 記錄的結構描述必須符合傳遞至 方法之 的中繼資料 (Metadata) 所描述的結構描述。

span.span: The schema for the record must match the schema described by the metadata of the passed to the method.

summary.span: 將資料的單一資料列傳送回用戶端。

span.span: Sends a single row of data back to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Managed 預存程序可以將結果集傳送給未實作的用戶端。Managed stored procedures can send result sets to clients that are not implementing a . 這個方法中，連同和，可讓自訂結果集給用戶端傳送的預存程序。This method, along with and , allows stored procedures to send custom result sets to the client. 方法會將單一資料列的資料傳送回用戶端。The method sends a single row of data back to the client. 資料列可以接著傳回給呼叫者藉由呼叫，一次傳送每個資料列。Rows can subsequently be returned to the caller by calling , one time for each row being sent. 已傳送所有資料列，呼叫之後方法無須標示結果集的結尾。After all the rows have been sent, a call to the method is required to mark the end of the result set. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新及其。The following example creates a new and its . 範例接著標示結果集使用的開頭方法，會將範例資料與記錄傳送回用戶端會使用方法，並以設定結果的結尾標記方法。The example then marks the beginning of a result set using the method, sends records with example data back to the client using the method, and marks the end of the result set with the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsRow/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SendResultsStart(class Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlDataRecord record) cil managed

param.name: record
param.span: 物件，您可以從中擷取中繼資料，也可用它來描述結果集。

span.span: A object from which metadata is extracted and used to describe the result set.

summary.span: 標記要傳送回用戶端之結果集的開頭，並使用這個 record 參數，建構描述結果集的中繼資料。

span.span: Marks the beginning of a result set to be sent back to the client, and uses the record parameter to construct the metadata that describes the result set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Managed 預存程序可以將結果集傳送給未實作的用戶端。Managed stored procedures can send result sets to clients that are not implementing a . 這個方法中，連同和，允許將自訂結果集給用戶端傳送的預存程序。This method, along with and , allow stored procedures to send custom result sets to the client. 方法標記開頭的結果集，並使用記錄的參數來建構說明結果集的中繼資料。The method marks the beginning of a result set, and uses the record parameter to construct the metadata that describes the result set. 所有後續資料列，使用傳送方法，必須符合該中繼資料定義。All the subsequent rows, sent using the method, must match that metadata definition. 請注意，之後呼叫，則只和可以呼叫。Note that after calling , only and can be called. 在相同的執行個體中的任何其他方法會擲回。Any other method in the same instance of throws an . 設定還原為初始狀態可以呼叫其他方法的位置。 sets back to the initial state where other methods can be called. 從執行 CLR 執行 TRANSACT-SQL 傳回控制項之後，請勿嘗試使用靜態或本機變數初始化為 CLR 記憶體。After control returns to Transact-SQL from CLR execution, do not attempt to use a static or local variable initialized to CLR memory. 例如，不要儲存在程序的執行個體類別，例如`SQLDataRecord`，用來傳回從 CLR 的控制項之後。For example, do not store an instance of an in process class, for example `SQLDataRecord`, which will be used after control returns from CLR. 其中一個例外是`SQLMetaData`程序類別中。One exception is the `SQLMetaData` in process class. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新及其。The following example creates a new and its . 範例接著標示結果集使用的開頭方法，會將範例資料與記錄傳送回用戶端會使用方法，並以設定結果的結尾標記方法。The example then marks the beginning of a result set using the method, sends records with example data back to the client using the method, and marks the end of the result set with the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsStart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsStart/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsStart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlPipe.SendResultsStart/VB/source.vb#1)]
